text1.text: The Drawbridge is a device that can extend a range of blocks in front of it when provided with a redstone signal.

text2.text: When provided with a redstone signal, the drawbridge will extend up to 16 blocks (configurable) outwards from the front face, and when that signal is removed, it will retract those blocks.
Warning: any block drops that do not fit into the slot will be dropped into the world
